page.title: 13EVERGREENS.(3).
page.content: {Mr.Chester }is younger than some other people,he is in his early sixties so he goes out to do shopping for other people and to get their pension.{On {Tuesday mornings he puts the tables and chairs out for bingo.He enjoys living at the {Evergreens.}He has lived there for {7years.}He sometimes visits people.He sits down in the lounge playing{cards,dominoes etc. He makes his own meals in his kitchen. His hobbies are playing{cards,watching {television and sport }but he doesn't like gardening.There are prizes for the best kept garden the prize is a shield.For two years the Evergreens have won the shield.{Mr.Chester}gets up at{ 6.00 _ 6.30am }and goes to bed at {10.05pm.}He is good friends with everyone who lives at the {Evergreens.He also thinks the wardens {are very nice.
